messages.content: Who is Florian Saling and for which organization does he work for

As of July 16, 2025, Florian Saling works as an XR Software & Infrastructure Engineer at the European Space Agency (ESA) [torchwood4](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). He has been in this role since February 2021 [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). His work at ESA involves exploring the potential of XR for astronaut training, developing and implementing XR applications for use in microgravity environments, and researching XR for human spaceflight [torchwood4](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). He is also affiliated with the German Aerospace Center (DLR) in Köln, where his work involves Space Operations and Astronaut Training [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3].

web_research_result:
As of July 16, 2025, Florian Saling works as an XR Software & Infrastructure Engineer at the European Space Agency (ESA) [torchwood4](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). His work involves exploring the potential of XR for astronaut training, developing and implementing XR applications for use in microgravity environments, and researching XR for human spaceflight [torchwood4](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). He has been in this role since February 2021 [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).

Saling is also affiliated with the German Aerospace Center (DLR) in Köln. [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3) His work with DLR involves Space Operations and Astronaut Training. [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)

Other affiliations and activities:

*   **Education:** He was a tutor at SRH Hochschule Heidelberg from 2017 to 2019 and a lecturer for Sustainability Management at Technical University Dresden from October 2013. [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1) He obtained a Master of Science in Visual Computing & Games Technology from Hochschule Bonn-Rhein-Sieg, University of Applied Sciences (2020-2022) and a Bachelor of Science in Virtual & Augmented Realities from SRH Hochschule Heidelberg (2016-2019). [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1)
*   **Past Experience:** He completed an internship in XR Software Development / User Experience at AKKA DSW GmbH. [xing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1)
*   **Publications:** Saling has publications related to eXtended Reality (XR) technologies for astronaut training. [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [dblp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5)
